about_the_game:
In this DLC I, mahoumaiden, as the one and only author of REFLEXIA Prototype ver., share with you all the graphics from the game in original resolution. You can use them to make any merch you want, memes or your own videos, and also put them as desktop wallpaper or as an avatar in social networks. There are only three rules:
1. Include my authorship and the source (a link to the game on Steam, or just its name).
2. Only for personal use! No commercial activities (except monetizing videos).
3. Observe the previous two rules. All details will be inside the text file in the DLC itself.

The DLC includes:
- 7 illustrations in .psd format:
* all of them in the original resolution of 1280x960;
* each of them is divided into layers, so you can build the desired expression of the character's face and, perhaps, change the background;
* in many pictures there are variations of emotions and backgrounds unused in the game;
* bonus sketches.
- 5 images of the sky, which were used for illustrations in the discs:
* 3 images in 3000x3000;
* another in 1624x1624;
* ...and the last one in 1448x1448.
- original illustration from the cover in the Steam library (640x480);
- a text file with the rules and with my comments on how I created all these graphics.

Purchasing this DLC is a way to support me in the development of the upcoming remake and my future projects.

AFTER PURCHASING, YOU CAN FIND THIS DLC IN THE MAIN GAME'S FOLDER.
